tasks.description: You have been assigned a Site Survey in relation with a new business request.
tasks.subject: Please Complete a KIS Site Survey

tasks.description: Please send out a contract to the new Customer - the contract can be sent from the Account Page using Docusign.
tasks.subject: Please Convert your Lead

tasks.description:
Please follow up on your requested Site Survey.
If the Site Survey has been completed:
1) Confirm checkbox 'Site Survey completed' is marked.
2) Cls (Close) this task
3) Convert the Lead
tasks.subject: Completed Site Survey Required
